00046 /*******************************************************************************

00049 
00050 /* Table of display devices. */
00051 static DISPLAY_Device_t deviceTable[DISPLAY_DEVICES_MAX];
00052 
00053 /* This variable keeps track of whether the DISPLAY module is initialized
00054    or not. */
00055 static bool moduleInitialized = false;
00056 
00057 /* This variable keeps track of the number of devices that have been
00058     registered. */
00059 static int devicesRegistered=0;
00060 
00061 /*
00062  * Table of display device driver initialization functions to be called in
00063  * DISPLAY_Init, the DISPLAY module init function.
00064  */
00065 static pDisplayDeviceDriverInitFunction_t pDisplayDeviceDriverInitFunctions[] =
00066   DISPLAY_DEVICE_DRIVER_INIT_FUNCTIONS;
00067 
00071 /*******************************************************************************
00072  **************************     GLOBAL FUNCTIONS      **************************
00073  ******************************************************************************/
00074 
00075 /***************************************************************************/
00081 EMSTATUS DISPLAY_Init (void)
00082 {
00083   EMSTATUS status;
00084 
00085   pDisplayDeviceDriverInitFunction_t* pDisplayDeviceDriverInitFunction =
00086     pDisplayDeviceDriverInitFunctions;
00087 
00088   if (false == moduleInitialized)
00089   {
00090     moduleInitialized = true;
00091     for (; *pDisplayDeviceDriverInitFunction; pDisplayDeviceDriverInitFunction++)
00092     {
00093       status = (*pDisplayDeviceDriverInitFunction)();
00094       if (DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK != status)
00095         return status;
00096     }
00097   }
00098 
00099   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 /***************************************************************************/
00114 EMSTATUS DISPLAY_DriverRefresh (void)
00115 {
00116   int        i;
00117   EMSTATUS status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00118 
00119   if (false == moduleInitialized)
00120   {
00121     status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00122   }
00123   else
00124   {
00125     for (i=0; i<devicesRegistered; i++)
00126     {
00127       if (deviceTable[i].pDriverRefresh)
00128       {
00129         status = (*deviceTable[i].pDriverRefresh)(&deviceTable[i]);
00130         if (DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK != status)
00131         {
00132           return status;
00133         }
00134       }
00135     }
00136   }
00137 
00138   return status;
00139 }

00156 EMSTATUS DISPLAY_DeviceGet(int                displayDeviceNo,
00157                            DISPLAY_Device_t*  device)
00158 {
00159   EMSTATUS status;
00160 
00161   if (false == moduleInitialized)
00162   {
00163     status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00164   }
00165   else
00166   {
00167     if (displayDeviceNo < DISPLAY_DEVICES_MAX)
00168     {
00169       memcpy(device, &deviceTable[displayDeviceNo], sizeof(DISPLAY_Device_t));
00170       status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00171     }
00172     else
00173     {
00174       status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OUT_OF_RANGE;
00175     }
00176   }
00177   return status;
00178 }
00179 
00180 
00181 /**************************************************************************/
00189 EMSTATUS DISPLAY_DeviceRegister(DISPLAY_Device_t *device)
00190 {
00191   EMSTATUS status;
00192 
00193   if (false == moduleInitialized)
00194   {
00195     status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED;
00196   }
00197   else
00198   {
00199     if (devicesRegistered < DISPLAY_DEVICES_MAX)
00200     {
00201       memcpy(&deviceTable[devicesRegistered++], device, sizeof(DISPLAY_Device_t));
00202       status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00203     }
00204     else
00205     {
00206       status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_ENOUGH_MEMORY;
00207     }
00208   }
00209   return status;
00210 }
